name: Remarks (Continued)
title: REMARKS
definition: Identifies a free flowing field that can be used to send a detailed message to the customer or to expand upon and clarify other data on the C/NR Form.
fieldNotes: This field should not be used in lieu of any existing error process.
This field will be limited to one per ASR transmission.  The entire ASR should be reviewed to ensure that all discrepancies have been included on the request.
